description: Alterations to front lightwell, including extension underneath front entrance steps and new door, with the replacement of damaged and rotten lintels over vaults access openings at basement level and alterations to fenestration details. Replace existing rear garden door with timber double glazed patio door; Creation of new garden access directly from basement in situ of existing rear window; with replacement of rear basement window with new double glazed French Door; to excavate and form brick steps to garden with brick retaining walls on both sides; and glass banisters. Internal alterations including to widen structural opening in basement to open front chimney in basement; Make new thermally insulated and waterproofed floor to the basement with channels and under floor heating plus re-plaster basement walls. Internal alterations to relocate basement kitchen and boiler to ground floor rear room; to relocate top floor rear bathroom to first floor rear room and reclaim top floor rear bedroom; to adjust loft access openings to take loft ladders and thermally insulate and board the lofts throughout; to replace existing sandblasted glazing with clear single panes to front ground floor and rear top floor windows; to repoint external brickwork with flush lime and sand mortar; to replace structural timber where necessary, and other associated works.
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
